assessments.name: PHQ-9 Depression Screening
assessments.description: A 9-question depression screening tool that scores each of the nine DSM-IV criteria for depression.
assessments.instructions: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by any of the following problems?
questions: Little interest or pleasure in doing things
Trouble falling or staying asleep, or sleeping too much
Feeling tired or having little energy
Feeling bad about yourself - or that you are a failure or have let yourself or your family down
Trouble concentrating on things, such as reading the newspaper or watching television
Moving or speaking so slowly that other people could have noticed. Or the opposite - being so fidgety or restless that you have been moving around a lot more than usual
Thoughts that you would be better off dead or of hurting yourself in some way

interpretation.recommendation: Your score suggests minimal or no symptoms of depression.
Your score suggests mild symptoms of depression. Consider discussing your feelings with a healthcare provider.
Your score suggests moderate symptoms of depression. We recommend speaking with a healthcare provider.
Your score suggests moderately severe symptoms of depression. We strongly recommend consulting with a healthcare provider.
Your score suggests severe symptoms of depression. Please seek help from a healthcare provider as soon as possible.

assessments.name: GAD-7 Anxiety Screening
assessments.description: A 7-item scale used to measure the severity of anxiety symptoms.
assessments.instructions: Over the last 2 weeks, how often have you been bothered by the following problems?
questions: Feeling nervous, anxious, or on edge
Not being able to stop or control worrying
Worrying too much about different things
Being so restless that it's hard to sit still
Feeling afraid as if something awful might happen

interpretation.recommendation: Your score suggests minimal or no symptoms of anxiety.
Your score suggests mild symptoms of anxiety. Consider discussing your feelings with a healthcare provider.
Your score suggests moderate symptoms of anxiety. We recommend speaking with a healthcare provider.
Your score suggests severe symptoms of anxiety. Please consider seeking help from a healthcare provider.
